name: Day's Dawn
description:
Day's Dawn is one of three Prototypes I've created for you to vote which one I should develop further! You can vote on https://discord.me/byxtogo

You can find some relaxing platforming in Day's Dawn, paired with intense fighting. Defeat your enemies with different types of attacks and combos.

Controls:
Move: A / D
Jump: SPACE
Dodge: LEFT SHIFT
Attack: K + other Actions (like pressing S, attacking in midair)
Parry: I
